sqlMap.select: SELECT CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') estDate,TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') actDate,OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2) estTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4) estTimeMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2) actTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4) actTimeMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ORIG_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeDepHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ORIG_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeDepMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.DEST_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeArrHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.DEST_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeArrMin, OPR.ORIG fromLoc, OPR.DEST toLoc, OPR.SVC_TYPE svcType,OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE cargoArcftType, OPR.ACFT_REG_NO arcftRegionNo,OPR.STATUS arrDepStatus,OPR.SCH_GATE gate,OPR.ACFT_PRK_BAY bay, OPR.DELAY_CODE delayCode,OPR.GROUND_HANDLER handler,CAST(OPR.PRTY_IND AS TEXT) priorityInd,OPR.WTHR_COND weather, OPR.RMK remarks,OPR.JV_CODE jvInd,OPR.WH_LEVEL warehouselvl,OPR.BRKBUP_OFF buildBreakDown, COALESCE(EVENT.FFM_IND,'N') ffmInd, COALESCE(EVENT.DLS_IND,'N') dlsInd, OPR.FLT_MODULE1 fltmodule1, OPR.FLT_MODULE2 fltmodule2, CHKOUT_AREA chkOutArea, ACFT_PRK_BAY arrDepStatus, TO_IND toIndicator, (select cc.CODE_DESC from CUST_COMPANY cc where cc.code = OPR.rho_id) rhoUserName, OPR.MANP_RMK manpowerRemark, OPR.VESSEL_ID vesselId, OPR.VESSEL_NAME vesselName, OPR.VOYAGE_NUM voyageNumber, OPR.CALL_SIGN_VESSEL vesselflightCallSign, OPR.SHIPPING_AGENT shippingAgent FROM FLT_OPR OPR LEFT OUTER JOIN FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT ON OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO WHERE OPR.FLT_KEY = #flightKey# AND OPR.SCH_DATE = to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY') AND OPR.FLT_TYPE = #flightType#
SELECT TR_NO AS trno, CARR_CODE AS flightCarr,FLT_KEY AS flightKey FROM FLT_SCH_AIRLINE WHERE TR_NO = #trno#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_SCH_AIRLINE SET FLT_KEY = #flightKey# WHERE TR_NO=#trno# AND CARR_CODE = #flightCarr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TR_NO AS txnNo, CARR_CODE AS flightCarr,FLT_KEY AS flightNoKey FROM FLT_OPR_AIRLINE WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR_AIRLINE SET FLT_KEY = #flightNoKey# WHERE TR_NO=#txnNo# AND CARR_CODE = #flightCarr#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLT_OPR( TR_NO, CARR_CODE, FLT_NO, FLT_KEY, ORG_FLT_DATE, SCH_DATE, FLT_TYPE, EST_DATE, EST_TIME, ACT_DATE, ACT_TIME, SVC_TYPE, ACFT_TYPE, ACFT_REG_NO, STATUS, SCH_GATE, ACFT_PRK_BAY, DELAY_CODE,GROUND_HANDLER, PRTY_IND, WTHR_COND, RMK, JV_CODE, WH_LEVEL, BRKBUP_OFF, TR_STATUS,CR_USER_ID, CR_DATE, LM_USER_ID, LM_DATE,CGO_ACFT_TYPE, FLT_MODULE1,FLT_MODULE2,CHKOUT_AREA,TO_IND,RHO_ID,MANP_RMK, STOP_AUTO_EST_YN, EST_TIME_SOURCE,VESSEL_ID,VESSEL_NAME,VOYAGE_NUM,CALL_SIGN_VESSEL,SHIPPING_AGENT ) VALUES( #txnNo#,UPPER(#flightCarr#),UPPER(#flightNo#),UPPER(#flightKey#),TO_DATE(#orgFltDate#,'DDMONYY'), TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY'),#flightType#,TO_DATE(#estDate#,'DDMONYY'),#hrAndMinEst#, TO_DATE(#actDate#,'DDMONYY'),#hrAndMinAct#,#svcType#,#airCraftType#,#arcftRegionNo#, #arrDepStatus#,#gate#,#bay#,#delayCode#,#handler#,#priorityInd#,#weather#,#remarks#, #jvInd#,#warehouselvl#,#buildBreakDown#,'N',#userId#,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),#userId#,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), #cargoArcftType#,#fltModule1#,#fltModule2#,#chkOutArea#,#toIndicator#,#rhoUser#,#manpowerRemark#, COALESCE(#stopAutoEstYN#, 'N'), CASE #updateEstSource# WHEN 'Y' THEN 'USER' ELSE NULL END,#vesselId#, #vesselName#,#voyageNumber#,#vesselflightCallSign#,#shippingAgent# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR SET WTHR_COND = #weather# WHERE CARR_CODE=#flightCarr# AND FLT_NO=#flightNo# AND SCH_DATE= TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') AND FLT_TYPE= #flightType#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM FLT_OPR WHERE CARR_CODE=#flightCarr# AND FLT_NO=#flightNo# AND SCH_DATE= TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') AND FLT_TYPE= #flightType#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR SET ORIG = UPPER(#fromLoc#), ORIG_DATE = TO_DATE(#orgFltDate#,'DDMONYY'), ORIG_TIME = #fromLocHrMin:NUMERIC#, DEST = UPPER(#toLoc#), SCH_TIME = CASE FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN #toLocHrMin:NUMERIC# WHEN 'D' THEN #fromLocHrMin:NUMERIC# WHEN 'B' THEN #fromLocHrMin:NUMERIC# END, DEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDateTo#,'DDMONYY'), DEST_TIME = #toLocHrMin:NUMERIC#, CGO_ACFT_TYPE = #cargoArcftType#, TR_TYPE=#trtype#, LM_USER_ID=#userId#, LM_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), RHO_ID = #rhoUser#, MANP_RMK = #manpowerRemark# WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLT_OPR_EVENTS( TR_NO, CARR_CODE, FLT_NO, FLT_KEY, ORG_FLT_DATE, SCH_DATE,FFM_IND, DLS_IND,TR_TYPE ) VALUES( #txnNo#,UPPER(#flightCarr#),UPPER(#flightNo#),UPPER(#flightKey#),TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY'), TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY'),#ffmInd#,#dlsInd#,#trtype# )

INSERT INTO FLT_OPR_LEG( TR_NO, DOC_LINE_NO, CARR_CODE, FLT_NO, FLT_KEY, ORG_FLT_DATE, SCH_DATE, BRD_POINT, OFF_POINT, LEG_ORD,SCH_DEP_DATE, SCH_DEP_TIME, SCH_ARR_DATE, SCH_ARR_TIME, ACFT_TYPE,JNT_CAR_1,JNT_FLT_1, JNT_CAR_2,JNT_FLT_2,JNT_CAR_3,JNT_FLT_3,JNT_CAR_4,JNT_FLT_4, JNT_CAR_5,JNT_FLT_5,JNT_CAR_6,JNT_FLT_6, TR_STATUS, CR_USER_ID, CR_DATE, LM_USER_ID, LM_DATE,FLT_TYPE,PROHIBIT_SHC1,PROHIBIT_SHC2,PROHIBIT_SHC3,HSE_BU_IND,AUTO_ASSGN_ULD, TR_TYPE) VALUES( #txnNo#,#docLineNo#,UPPER(#flightCarr#),UPPER(#flightNo#),UPPER(#flightKey#),TO_DATE(#orgFltDate#,'DDMONYY'), TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY'), UPPER(#fromLoc#), UPPER(#toLoc#),#srlNo#,TO_DATE(#schDepDate#,'DDMONYY'), #hrAndMinSchDep#,TO_DATE(#schArrDate#,'DDMONYY'),#hrAndMinSchArr#,#airCraftType#, UPPER(#jointFltCar1#),UPPER(#jointFltNo1#), UPPER(#jointFltCar2#), UPPER(#jointFltNo2#), UPPER(#jointFltCar3#), UPPER(#jointFltNo3#), UPPER(#jointFltCar4#), UPPER(#jointFltNo4#), UPPER(#jointFltCar5#), UPPER(#jointFltNo5#), UPPER(#jointFltCar6#), UPPER(#jointFltNo6#),'N',#userId#,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),#userId#,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),#flightType#,#prohibitedShc1#,#prohibitedShc2#, #prohibitedShc3#,COALESCE(#houseBldConfig#,'N'),#autoAssignUld#, 'FLTCR')
sqlMap.select: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(BASE_PORT,'HKG')) FROM SYS_PARAM
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_CARRIER WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#) AND OWNED_CARR = 'Y'
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM ARCHIVE_LOG_MON WHERE FLT_KEY= (CONCAT(#flightCarr# , #flightNo#)) AND FLT_DATE = TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') AND FLT_TYPE= #flightType#

SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM FLT_OPR WHERE UPPER(CARR_CODE) = UPPER(#flightCarr#) AND UPPER(FLT_NO) = UPPER(#flightNo#) AND TO_CHAR(SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') = UPPER(#schDate#) AND FLT_TYPE = #flightType#
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_ARPT WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#)
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_SPL_HAND_CODE WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#)
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_SPL_HAND_CODE WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#)
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_SPL_HAND_CODE WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#)
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_ACFT_TYPE WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#)
select uld_key as uld from exp_chkout_dtl where flt_key=#flightkey# and flt_date=TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') and chkout_date is null and chkout_user is null
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM MAST_FLIGHT WHERE UPPER(CODE) = UPPER(#CODE#) AND UPPER(FLT_NO) = UPPER(#FLT_NO#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GT_AIRL_TONNAGE_REPT WHERE AIRLINE = #carr# AND SEQ_NO = #seqStarts#
sqlMap.select:
select sourceDate sourceDate,ata ata,airline airline,aftFlowType aftFlowType,fltNo fltNo,fltDate fltDate,chargeType chargeType,flightType flightType,acftRegNum acftRegNum, aircraftType aircraftType,sum(weight) weight from (select DISTINCT to_char(fo.act_date,'DDMONYY') as sourceDate, To_Char(To_Date(CONCAT(To_Char(fo.Act_Date,'DDMONYY') , Lpad(CAST(fo.Act_Time AS TEXT),4,'0')),'DDMONYYHH24MI'),'DDMONYY HH24:MI') AS ata, fo.carr_code as airline, Case fo.flt_type When 'A' Then 'I' Else 'E' End as aftFlowType, fo.flt_key as fltNo, to_char(fo.sch_date,'DDMONYY') as fltDate, '' as chargeType, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_CODE_DTL where CODE_TYPE = 'CGO_ACFT_TYPE' and CODE = fo.CGO_ACFT_TYPE) AS flightType, ACFT_REG_NO acftRegNum, ACFT_TYPE AS aircraftType, (cast(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(( COALESCE(BLK_LCL,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPH_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPH_UNK,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPA_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPA_UNK,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPD_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_EPD_UNK,0)+ COALESCE(BLK_TS,0)+ COALESCE(NBK_TS,0)+ COALESCE(BUP_LCL,0)+ COALESCE(BUP_EPH_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(BUP_EPH_UNK,0)+ COALESCE(BUP_EPA_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(bup_epa_unk,0)+ COALESCE(BUP_EPD_KNW,0)+ COALESCE(bup_epd_unk,0)+ COALESCE(bup_ts,0)),0),'999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999.99')) as decimal(38,2))) as weight from flt_opr fo left join gt_airl_tonnage_rept gt on gt.flt_key = fo.flt_key and gt.sch_date = fo.sch_date and gt.flt_type = case fo.flt_type when 'A' then 'I' else 'E' end
gt.AIRLINE = #carr#
(gt.AIRLINE = #loginCarrier# OR gt.AIRLINE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
AND SEQ_NO = #seqStarts# WHERE to_date(to_char(fo.act_date,'DDMONYY'),'DDMONYY') BETWEEN to_date(#fromDate#,'DDMONYY') and to_date(#toDate#,'DDMONYY') AND (fo.status is null or fo.status != 'X')
fo.carr_code = #carr#
(fo.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR fo.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#)) ) group by sourceDate,ata,airline,aftFlowType,fltNo,fltDate,chargeType,flightType,aircraftType,acftRegNum order by sourceDate desc
SELECT CAST(0 AS TEXT)
SELECT FUN_CHECK_FLT_DATE(#FUN_CHECK_FLT_DATE#)

SELECT opr.flt_module1 AS module, CAST(opr.tr_no AS text) AS txnNo, opr.carr_code AS flightCarr, opr.flt_no AS flightNo, TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'DDMONYY') AS schDate, opr.flt_key AS flightKey, TO_CHAR(opr.est_date, 'DD') AS estDate, TO_CHAR(opr.act_date, 'DD') AS actDate, rtrim(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_time, '0000')), 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_time, '0000')), 3, 2), ':') AS hrAndMinSch, rtrim(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.est_time, '0000')), 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.est_time, '0000')), 3, 2), ':') AS hrAndMinEst, rtrim(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.act_time, '0000')), 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.act_time, '0000')), 3, 2), ':') AS hrAndMinAct, CASE opr.flt_type WHEN 'A' THEN orig WHEN 'D' THEN dest ELSE orig END AS fromLoc, (SELECT code_desc FROM mast_code_dtl WHERE code = opr.cgo_acft_type AND code_type = 'CGO_ACFT_TYPE') AS cargoArcftType, (SELECT code_desc FROM mast_acft_type WHERE code = opr.acft_type) AS airCraftType, opr.acft_reg_no AS arcftRegionNo, (SELECT code_desc FROM mast_code_dtl WHERE code = opr.status AND code_type = 'FLT_STATUS') AS arrDepStatus, opr.sch_gate AS gate, opr.acft_prk_bay AS bay, opr.wthr_cond AS weather, opr.rmk AS remarks, opr.flt_type AS flightType, CASE opr.flt_type WHEN 'A' THEN COALESCE((SELECT 'Y' FROM edi_ffm_msg t WHERE flt_key = opr.flt_key AND flt_date = opr.sch_date AND ffm_status = 'P' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM edi_ffm_uld WHERE tr_no = t.tr_no) LIMIT 1), 'N') WHEN 'D' THEN event.dls_ind END AS ffmInd, public.pkg_common__GET_FLT_ATA(opr.flt_key, opr.sch_date, opr.flt_type, 'DD') AS ata, CONCAT(public.pkg_common__GET_FLT_ETA(opr.flt_key, opr.sch_date, opr.flt_type, 'DD') , COALESCE(opr.est_time_source, CONCAT(' (', opr.est_time_source, ')'), NULL)) AS eta, TO_CHAR(opr.lm_date, 'DDMMYY HH24:MI:SS') AS lastModifiedDate, TO_CHAR(event.lm_date, 'DDMMYY HH24:MI:SS') AS lastModifiedDateEvent, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM imp_ramp_chk_hd ii WHERE ii.flt_key = opr.flt_key AND TO_CHAR(ii.flt_date, 'DDMONYY') = TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'DDMONYY') AND opr.flt_type = 'A') > 0 THEN 'Y' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM imp_car_shp ss WHERE ss.flt_key = opr.flt_key AND TO_CHAR(ss.flt_date, 'DDMONYY') = TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'DDMONYY') AND opr.flt_type = 'A') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS cargoContent, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(opr.est_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(opr.est_time AS TEXT), 4, '0')) AS estimateDate, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(opr.sch_time AS TEXT), 4, '0')) AS scheduleDate, opr.rho_id AS rhoUser, (SELECT code_desc FROM cust_company WHERE code = opr.rho_id) AS rhoUserName, opr.manp_rmk AS manpowerRemark, (SELECT STRING_AGG(brd_point, '/') || '/' || STRING_AGG(off_point, '/') FROM flt_opr_leg WHERE tr_no = opr.tr_no) AS route, opr.dest AS dest, opr.orig AS orig, COALESCE(opr.stop_auto_est_yn, 'N') AS stopAutoEstYN, opr.est_time_source AS estTimeSource, opr.vessel_id AS vesselId, opr.vessel_name AS vesselName, opr.voyage_num AS voyageNumber, opr.call_sign_vessel AS vesselflightCallSign, opr.shipping_agent AS shippingAgent FROM flt_opr opr JOIN flt_opr_events event ON opr.tr_no = event.tr_no JOIN flt_opr_leg leg ON opr.tr_no = leg.tr_no WHERE OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO AND OPR.TR_NO=LEG.TR_NO AND OPR.FLT_TYPE = CASE UPPER(#flightType#) WHEN 'B' THEN OPR.FLT_TYPE ELSE UPPER(#flightType#) END
OPR.CARR_CODE LIKE UPPER (#flightCarr#)
( opr.RHO_ID IN (SELECT CODE AS codeId FROM CUST_COMPANY WHERE RHO_YN = 'Y'and code_desc =#rhoUser#) )
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
OPR.FLT_NO LIKE UPPER (#flightNo#)
(
OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'B'
OPR.FLT_TYPE != 'B'
)
'Y' = (CASE WHEN OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'A' THEN (CASE WHEN (select count(1) from flt_opr_leg leg where OPR.TR_NO = leg.TR_NO and brd_point in #fromLoc#) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) WHEN OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'D' THEN (CASE WHEN (select count(1) from flt_opr_leg leg where OPR.TR_NO = leg.TR_NO and off_point in #fromLoc#) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'N' END)
TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'DDMONYY'), TRIM(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_time, '0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#schDate#, #schTimeHr#, #schTimeMin#), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#schDateTo#, #schTimeHrTo#, #schTimeMinTo#), 'DDMONYYHH24MI')
OPR.carr_code = #carrList#
( OPR.carr_code = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.carr_code IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #groupCarrList#))
OPR.FLT_MODULE1 = #module#
AND CASE WHEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,|trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,|trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') ELSE TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') END ELSE TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') END BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#fltFromDate#,#fltTimeHr#,#fltTimeMin#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#fltToDate#,#fltTimeHrTo#,#fltTimeMinTo#),'DDMONYYHH24MI')
(LEG.BRD_POINT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mast_city.code FROM mast_city, mast_country WHERE mast_country.code =mast_city.CTRY_CODE AND mast_country.code =#country# ) OR LEG.OFF_POINT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mast_city.code FROM mast_city, mast_country WHERE mast_country.code =mast_city.CTRY_CODE AND mast_country.code =#country# ))
OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE = #cargoArcftType#
((OPR.FLT_TYPE='A' AND EVENT.FLT_CLS_YN='N') OR ((OPR.FLT_TYPE='D' AND (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD')) IS NULL)))
COALESCE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(opr.est_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(opr.est_time AS TEXT), 4, '0')),CONCAT(TO_CHAR(opr.sch_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(opr.sch_time AS TEXT), 4, '0'))) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.ACT_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.ACT_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
$sortOrder.sortField$
,flightKey

SELECT count(*) as totalRowCount FROM FLT_OPR OPR, FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT, FLT_OPR_LEG LEG WHERE OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO AND OPR.TR_NO=LEG.TR_NO AND OPR.FLT_TYPE = CASE UPPER(#flightType#) WHEN 'B' THEN OPR.FLT_TYPE ELSE UPPER(#flightType#) END
OPR.RHO_ID = #rhoUser#
OPR.carr_code = #carrList#
( OPR.carr_code = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.carr_code IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #groupCarrList#))
OPR.FLT_MODULE1 = #module#
AND CASE WHEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,|trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,|trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') ELSE TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') END ELSE TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') ,trim(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') END BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#fltFromDate#,#fltTimeHr#,#fltTimeMin#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#fltToDate#,#fltTimeHrTo#,#fltTimeMinTo#),'DDMONYYHH24MI')
(LEG.BRD_POINT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mast_city.code FROM mast_city, mast_country WHERE mast_country.code =mast_city.CTRY_CODE AND mast_country.code =#country# ) OR LEG.OFF_POINT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mast_city.code FROM mast_city, mast_country WHERE mast_country.code =mast_city.CTRY_CODE AND mast_country.code =#country# ))
OPR.CARR_CODE LIKE UPPER (#flightCarr#)
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
OPR.FLT_NO LIKE UPPER (#flightNo#)
(
OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'B'
OPR.FLT_TYPE != 'B'
)
'Y' = (CASE WHEN OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'A' THEN (CASE WHEN (select count(1) from flt_opr_leg leg where OPR.TR_NO = leg.TR_NO and brd_point in #fromLoc#) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) WHEN OPR.FLT_TYPE = 'D' THEN (CASE WHEN (select count(1) from flt_opr_leg leg where OPR.TR_NO = leg.TR_NO and off_point in #fromLoc#) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'N' END)
TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY'),trim(to_char(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDate#,#schTimeHr#,#schTimeMin#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDateTo#,#schTimeHrTo#,#schTimeMinTo#),'DDMONYYHH24MI')
OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE = #cargoArcftType#
((OPR.FLT_TYPE='A' AND EVENT.FLT_CLS_YN='N') OR ((OPR.FLT_TYPE='D' AND (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD')) IS NULL)))

SELECT CAST(TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, CARR_CODE flightCarr, FLT_NO flightNo, FLT_KEY flightKey, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDateTo, TRIM(CONCAT(CASE COALESCE(MON_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(TUE_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 2 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(WED_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 3 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(THU_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 4 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(FRI_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 5 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(SAT_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 6 ELSE '' END , CASE COALESCE(SUN_FLG,'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN 7 ELSE '' END)) frequency, LM_USER_ID as staffId, FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,0) fromLoc, FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,-1) toLoc,FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,-2) std, FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,-3) sta, FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,1) portOfCall1,FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,2) portOfCall2, FUN_GET_SCHEDULE_PORT(TR_NO,3) portOfCall3, coalesce(OUTSTANDING,'N') outstandingYN, RHO_ID rhoUser, CR_USER_ID AS createBy, to_char(cr_date,'DDMONYY HH24:MI:SS') createDate FROM FLT_SCH WHERE CARR_CODE = coalesce(nullif(#flightCarr#,''),CARR_CODE) AND FLT_NO = coalesce(nullif(#flightNo#,''),FLT_NO) AND coalesce(CGO_ACFT_TYPE,'*') = coalesce( nullif(#cargoArcftType#,''), coalesce(CGO_ACFT_TYPE,'*')) AND ((TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') between START_DATE and END_DATE) or (TO_DATE(#schDateTo#,'DDMONYY')between START_DATE and END_DATE) or (START_DATE >= TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and END_DATE<=TO_DATE(#schDateTo#,'DDMONYY'))) AND cr_user_id not in ('SSMCNL', 'SSMCNLNEW', 'SSMEQT', 'SSMTIM')
AND (CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
OUTSTANDING = 'Y'
$sortOrder.sortField$

SELECT count(*) as totalRowCount FROM FLT_SCH WHERE CARR_CODE = coalesce(nullif(#flightCarr#,''),CARR_CODE) AND FLT_NO = coalesce(nullif(#flightNo#,''),FLT_NO) AND coalesce(CGO_ACFT_TYPE,'*') = coalesce(nullif(#cargoArcftType#,''), coalesce(CGO_ACFT_TYPE,'*')) AND ((TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') between START_DATE and END_DATE) or (TO_DATE(#schDateTo#,'DDMONYY')between START_DATE and END_DATE) or (START_DATE >= TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and END_DATE<=TO_DATE(#schDateTo#,'DDMONYY'))) AND cr_user_id not in ('SSMCNL', 'SSMCNLNEW', 'SSMEQT', 'SSMTIM')
AND (CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
OUTSTANDING = 'Y'

SELECT CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinSch, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinEst, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinAct, OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, CASE OPR.FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN ORIG WHEN 'D' THEN DEST ELSE ORIG END fromLoc,OPR.ACFT_TYPE cargoArcftType, WTHR_COND weather, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE_TYPE='WTH_CONDN' AND CODE=OPR.WTHR_COND) AS weatherdesc, TO_CHAR(OPR.LM_DATE,'DDMONYY HH24:MI:SS') lastModifiedDate
FROM FLT_OPR OPR LEFT OUTER JOIN FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT ON OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO WHERE OPR.FLT_TYPE LIKE #FLT_TYPE# AND OPR.CARR_CODE LIKE UPPER(#CARR_CODE#) AND OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CODE FROM MAST_CARRIER WHERE OWNED_CARR = 'Y') AND OPR.FLT_NO LIKE UPPER(#FLT_NO#) AND to_date(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY'),trim(to_char(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))),'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#SCH_DATE#,#SCH_TIME_FROM#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#SCH_DATE_TO#,#SCH_TIME_TO#),'DDMONYYHH24MI')
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #LOGIN_CARR# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #LOGIN_CARR#))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLT_OPR WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# and to_char(LM_DATE, 'ddMMYY hh24:mi:ss') = #lastModifiedDate#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLT_OPR_SEG WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo#

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM FLT_OPR_EVENTS WHERE FLT_CLS_YN !='Y' AND OFLD_FLG !='Y' AND MNFST_RDY_FLG !='Y' AND DLS_IND !='Y' AND FREEZE_IND !='Y' AND BUILDUP_CDATE IS NULL AND WHSE_COMPL_DATE IS NULL AND DOC_COMPL_DATE IS NULL AND TR_NO = #txnNo#
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_ULD_AWB WHERE FLT_KEY =#flightKey# AND FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and case #flightType# when 'D' then 'E' else #flightType# end = 'E'

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM IMP_CAR_SHP WHERE FLT_KEY =#flightKey# AND FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')AND CAR_CREATED='Y' and case #flightType# when 'A' then 'I' else #flightType# end = 'I'
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM IMP_CAR_SHP WHERE FLT_KEY =#flightKey# AND FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')AND FFM_FLG='Y' and case #flightType# when 'A' then 'I' else #flightType# end = 'I'
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM IMP_CAR_SHP WHERE FLT_KEY =#flightKey# AND FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')AND RECD_PCS >0 and case #flightType# when 'D' then 'E' else #flightType# end = 'E'

SELECT CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') estDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') estDateConst, TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') actDate,OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2) estTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),0,2) estTimeHrConst, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4) estTimeMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4) estTimeMinConst, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2) actTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4) actTimeMin,
TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') oldActDate, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2) oldActTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4) oldActTimeMin,
SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ORIG_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeDepHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ORIG_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeDepMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.DEST_TIME,'0000')),1,2) schTimeArrHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.DEST_TIME,'0000')),3,4) schTimeArrMin, OPR.ORIG fromLoc, OPR.DEST toLoc, OPR.SVC_TYPE svcType,OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE cargoArcftType, OPR.ACFT_REG_NO arcftRegionNo,OPR.STATUS arrDepStatus,OPR.SCH_GATE gate,OPR.ACFT_PRK_BAY bay, OPR.DELAY_CODE delayCode,OPR.GROUND_HANDLER handler,CAST(OPR.PRTY_IND AS TEXT) priorityInd,OPR.WTHR_COND weather, OPR.RMK remarks,OPR.JV_CODE jvInd,OPR.WH_LEVEL warehouselvl,OPR.BRKBUP_OFF buildBreakDown, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EDI_FFM_MSG t WHERE FLT_KEY = OPR.FLT_KEY AND FLT_DATE = OPR.SCH_DATE AND FFM_STATUS = 'P' and exists (select null from EDI_FFM_ULD where tr_no = t.tr_no) LIMIT 1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ffmInd, COALESCE(EVENT.DLS_IND,'N') dlsInd, OPR.FLT_MODULE1 fltmodule1, OPR.FLT_MODULE2 fltmodule2, CHKOUT_AREA chkOutArea, ACFT_PRK_BAY arrDepStatus, TO_IND toIndicator, (select cc.CODE_DESC from CUST_COMPANY cc where cc.code= OPR.rho_id ) rhoUserName, OPR.MANP_RMK manpowerRemark, COALESCE(OPR.STOP_AUTO_EST_YN, 'N') stopAutoEstYN, OPR.EST_TIME_SOURCE estTimeSource, OPR.VESSEL_ID vesselId, OPR.VESSEL_NAME vesselName, OPR.VOYAGE_NUM voyageNumber, OPR.CALL_SIGN_VESSEL vesselflightCallSign, OPR.SHIPPING_AGENT shippingAgent FROM FLT_OPR OPR LEFT OUTER JOIN FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT ON OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO WHERE OPR.TR_NO = #txnNo#

SELECT CAST(TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, CAST(DOC_LINE_NO AS TEXT) docLineNo, BRD_POINT fromLoc, OFF_POINT toLoc, CAST(LEG_ORD AS TEXT) srlNo, TO_CHAR(SCH_ARR_DATE,'DDMONYY') schArrDate, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2) schArrTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4) schArrTimeMin, TO_CHAR(SCH_DEP_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDepDate, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2) schDepTimeHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4) schDepTimeMin, ACFT_TYPE airCraftType, JNT_CAR_1 jointFltCar1,JNT_FLT_1 jointFltNo1,JNT_CAR_2 jointFltCar2,JNT_FLT_2 jointFltNo2, JNT_CAR_3 jointFltCar3,JNT_FLT_3 jointFltNo3,JNT_CAR_4 jointFltCar4,JNT_FLT_4 jointFltNo4, JNT_CAR_5 jointFltCar5,JNT_FLT_5 jointFltNo5,JNT_CAR_6 jointFltCar6,JNT_FLT_6 jointFltNo6, PROHIBIT_SHC1 prohibitedShc1, PROHIBIT_SHC2 prohibitedShc2, PROHIBIT_SHC3 prohibitedShc3, HSE_BU_IND houseBldConfig, AUTO_ASSGN_ULD autoAssignUld FROM FLT_OPR_LEG WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# Order by LEG_ORD
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLT_OPR_LEG WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# AND DOC_LINE_NO = #docLineNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR_LEG SET BRD_POINT = UPPER(#fromLoc#), OFF_POINT = UPPER(#toLoc#),LEG_ORD = #srlNo:NUMERIC#, SCH_DEP_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDepDate#,'DDMONYY'), SCH_DEP_TIME = #hrAndMinSchDep:NUMERIC#, SCH_ARR_DATE = TO_DATE(#schArrDate#,'DDMONYY'), SCH_ARR_TIME = #hrAndMinSchArr:NUMERIC#, ACFT_TYPE = #airCraftType#, JNT_CAR_1 = UPPER(#jointFltCar1#), JNT_FLT_1 = UPPER(#jointFltNo1#), JNT_CAR_2 = UPPER(#jointFltCar2#), JNT_FLT_2 = UPPER(#jointFltNo2#), JNT_CAR_3 = UPPER(#jointFltCar3#), JNT_FLT_3 = UPPER(#jointFltNo3#), JNT_CAR_4 = UPPER(#jointFltCar4#), JNT_FLT_4 = UPPER(#jointFltNo4#), JNT_CAR_5 = UPPER(#jointFltCar5#), JNT_FLT_5 = UPPER(#jointFltNo5#), JNT_CAR_6 = UPPER(#jointFltCar6#), JNT_FLT_6 = UPPER(#jointFltNo6#), PROHIBIT_SHC1 = UPPER(#prohibitedShc1#),PROHIBIT_SHC2 = UPPER(#prohibitedShc2#),PROHIBIT_SHC3 = UPPER(#prohibitedShc3#), HSE_BU_IND = #houseBldConfig#, AUTO_ASSGN_ULD = #autoAssignUld#, LM_USER_ID=#userId#, LM_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ,TR_TYPE='FLTCR' WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# AND DOC_LINE_NO = #docLineNo:NUMERIC#
UPDATE FLT_OPR_EVENTS SET FFM_IND = COALESCE(#ffmInd#,'N'), DLS_IND = COALESCE(#dlsInd#,'N') WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo#

UPDATE FLT_OPR SET EST_DATE = wos_to_date(#estDate#,'DDMONYY'), EST_TIME = #hrAndMinEst:NUMERIC#, ACT_DATE = wos_to_date(#actDate#,'DDMONYY'), ACT_TIME = #hrAndMinAct:NUMERIC#, SVC_TYPE = #svcType#, ACFT_TYPE = #airCraftType#, ACFT_REG_NO = #arcftRegionNo#, STATUS = #arrDepStatus#, SCH_GATE = #gate#, ACFT_PRK_BAY = #bay#, DELAY_CODE = #delayCode#, GROUND_HANDLER = #handler#, PRTY_IND = #priorityInd:NUMERIC#, WTHR_COND = #weather#, RMK = #remarks#, JV_CODE = #jvInd#, WH_LEVEL = #warehouselvl#, TR_STATUS = 'U', LM_USER_ID = #userId#, LM_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), CGO_ACFT_TYPE = #cargoArcftType#, FLT_MODULE1 = #fltModule1#,FLT_MODULE2 = #fltModule2# , CHKOUT_AREA = #chkOutArea# , TO_IND = #toIndicator#, TR_TYPE =#trtype#, RHO_ID = #rhoUser#, MANP_RMK = #manpowerRemark#, STOP_AUTO_EST_YN = CASE #updateEstSource# WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE #stopAutoEstYN# END, EST_TIME_SOURCE = CASE #updateEstSource# WHEN 'Y' THEN 'USER' ELSE EST_TIME_SOURCE END, VESSEL_ID = #vesselId#, VESSEL_NAME = #vesselName#, VOYAGE_NUM = #voyageNumber#, CALL_SIGN_VESSEL = #vesselflightCallSign#, SHIPPING_AGENT = #shippingAgent# WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo#
UPDATE FLT_OPR SET WTHR_COND = #weather#,LM_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# and TO_CHAR(LM_DATE,'DDMONYY HH24:MI:SS') = #lastModifiedDate#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, (select code_desc from mast_code_dtl where code_type = 'FLT_SVC_TYPE' and code = OPR.SVC_TYPE) svcType, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinSch, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinEst, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinAct, CASE OPR.FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN ORIG WHEN 'D' THEN DEST ELSE ORIG END fromLoc,OPR.ACFT_TYPE airCraftType, OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE cargoArcftType, OPR.ACFT_REG_NO arcftRegionNo, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE =OPR.STATUS AND CODE_TYPE='FLT_STATUS') arrDepStatus, OPR.SCH_GATE gate,OPR.ACFT_PRK_BAY bay, OPR.WTHR_COND weather, OPR.RMK remarks,OPR.LM_USER_ID lastUpdatedUser, TO_CHAR(OPR.LM_DATE,'DDMONYY HH24:MI') lastUpdatedDate, public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD') AS ata, public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ETA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD') AS eta, public.PKG_COMMON__flt_ports(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE) portOfCall1, '' portOfCall2, '' portOfCall3, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) AS estimateDate, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) AS scheduleDate, OPR.VESSEL_ID vesselId, OPR.VESSEL_NAME vesselName, OPR.VOYAGE_NUM voyageNumber, OPR.CALL_SIGN_VESSEL vesselflightCallSign, OPR.SHIPPING_AGENT shippingAgent FROM FLT_OPR OPR, MAST_CARRIER CARR WHERE OPR.FLT_TYPE = CASE UPPER(#flightType#) WHEN 'B' THEN OPR.FLT_TYPE ELSE UPPER(#flightType#) END AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY'),trim(to_char(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDate#,#startTime#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDateTo#,#endTime#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND CARR.CODE = OPR.CARR_CODE AND CARR.OWNED_CARR = 'Y'
AND COALESCE(OPR.STATUS,'%%') LIKE UPPER(#arrDepStatus#)
AND OPR.CARR_CODE LIKE UPPER(#flightCarr#)
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
flightType asc
COALESCE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')), CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0'))) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.ACT_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) ASC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.ACT_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) DESC
$sortOrder.sortField$

SELECT count(*) as totalRowCount FROM FLT_OPR OPR, MAST_CARRIER CARR WHERE OPR.FLT_TYPE = CASE UPPER(#flightType#) WHEN 'B' THEN OPR.FLT_TYPE ELSE UPPER(#flightType#) END AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY'),trim(to_char(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000'))), 'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDate#,#startTime#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(#schDateTo#,#endTime#),'DDMONYYHH24MI') AND CARR.CODE = OPR.CARR_CODE AND CARR.OWNED_CARR = 'Y'
AND COALESCE(OPR.STATUS,'%%') LIKE UPPER(#arrDepStatus#)
AND OPR.CARR_CODE LIKE UPPER(#flightCarr#)
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CAST((row_number() over (order by coalesce(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')), CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0'))) ASC)) AS TEXT) srlNo, CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DDMONYY') estDate,TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DDMONYY') actDate,OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinSch, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinEst, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinAct, OPR.ORIG fromLoc, CAST(ORIG_TIME AS TEXT) fromLocHrMin, OPR.DEST toLoc, CAST(DEST_TIME AS TEXT) toLocHrMin, OPR.SVC_TYPE svcType, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_ACFT_TYPE WHERE CODE =OPR.ACFT_TYPE) cargoArcftType, OPR.ACFT_REG_NO arcftRegionNo, (Select code_desc from MAST_CODE_DTL where code_type = 'FLT_STATUS' and code = OPR.STATUS) arrDepStatus, OPR.SCH_GATE gate,OPR.ACFT_PRK_BAY bay, OPR.DELAY_CODE delayCode,OPR.GROUND_HANDLER handler,CAST(OPR.PRTY_IND AS TEXT) priorityInd,OPR.WTHR_COND weather, OPR.RMK remarks,OPR.JV_CODE jvInd,OPR.WH_LEVEL warehouselvl,OPR.BRKBUP_OFF buildBreakDown, CASE OPR.FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN COALESCE((SELECT 'Y' FROM EDI_FFM_MSG t WHERE FLT_KEY = OPR.FLT_KEY AND FLT_DATE = OPR.SCH_DATE AND FFM_STATUS = 'P' LIMIT 1), 'N') END ffmInd, EVENT.DLS_IND dlsInd, EVENT.FLT_CLS_YN flightStatus, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0')) AS estimateDate, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT),4,'0')) AS scheduleDate, public.PKG_COMMON__flt_route(OPR.FLT_KEY, OPR.SCH_DATE, OPR.FLT_TYPE) as route, OPR.VESSEL_ID vesselId, OPR.VESSEL_NAME vesselName, OPR.VOYAGE_NUM voyageNumber, OPR.CALL_SIGN_VESSEL vesselflightCallSign, OPR.SHIPPING_AGENT shippingAgent FROM FLT_OPR OPR LEFT JOIN FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT ON OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO WHERE OPR.FLT_TYPE like #FLIGHT_TYPE# AND OPR.CARR_CODE like upper(#CARR_CODE#) AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(OPR.ACT_DATE,COALESCE(OPR.EST_DATE,OPR.SCH_DATE)),'DDMONYY') , TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(OPR.ACT_TIME,COALESCE(OPR.EST_TIME,COALESCE(OPR.SCH_TIME,0))),'0000'))),'DDMONYYHH24MI') BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) - INTERVAL '8 hours' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) + INTERVAL '12 hours'
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #LOGIN_CARR# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #LOGIN_CARR#))
AND OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO ORDER BY coalesce(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(OPR.EST_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0')),CONCAT(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LPAD(CAST(OPR.SCH_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0'))) ASC) WHERE CAST(srlNo AS FLOAT) between #FROM_NO# and #TO_NUM#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLT_SCH_SEG WHERE TR_NO = #TR_NO#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT WHERE TR_NO = #TR_NO#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLT_SCH_LEG WHERE TR_NO = #TR_NO#

SELECT CAST(LEG.DOC_LINE_NO AS TEXT) docLineNumber, CAST(LEG.TR_NO AS TEXT) trno, CAST(LEG.FRQ_NO AS TEXT) frequency, CAST(LEG.LEG_ORDER AS TEXT) legOrder, SCH.MON_FLG monday, SCH.TUE_FLG tuesday, SCH.WED_FLG wednesday, SCH.THU_FLG thursday, SCH.FRI_FLG friday, SCH.SAT_FLG saturday,SCH.SUN_FLG sunday, LEG.BRD_POINT boardPoint, LEG.OFF_POINT offPoint, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(LEG.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(LEG.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) scheduleArrTime, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(LEG.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(LEG.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) scheduleDepTime, SCH.CGO_ACFT_TYPE carraigeAircraftType, CAST((ARR_DAY_CHANGE) AS TEXT) arrDayChange, CAST(DEP_DAY_CHANGE AS TEXT) depDayChange, LEG.ACFT_TYPE aircraftType, SCH.SVC_TYPE svcType FROM FLT_SCH SCH, FLT_SCH_LEG LEG WHERE SCH.TR_NO = #TR_NO# AND SCH.TR_NO = LEG.TR_NO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR_LEG SET ACFT_TYPE = UPPER(#airCraftType#) WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# AND DOC_LINE_NO = #docLineNo:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CODE AS codeId, CODE_DESC AS codeDesc FROM MAST_CARRIER WHERE OWNED_CARR = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE_DESC
SELECT FUN_VALIDATE_FLT_NO(#FLT_NO#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLT_SCH(TR_NO,CARR_CODE, FLT_NO,START_DATE,END_DATE,FRQ_NO, FLT_KEY, MON_FLG,TUE_FLG,WED_FLG, THU_FLG,FRI_FLG,SAT_FLG,SUN_FLG,JV_CODE,WH_LEVEL,BRKBUP_OFF,CR_USER_ID,CR_DATE,LM_USER_ID,LM_DATE,CGO_ACFT_TYPE,SVC_TYPE,FLT_MODULE1,FLT_MODULE2,EXP_FLT_MODULE1,EXP_FLT_MODULE2,CHKOUT_AREA,TO_IND,RHO_ID,VESSEL_ID,VESSEL_NAME,VOYAGE_NUM,SHIPPING_AGENT) VALUES(#trno#,upper(#flightCarr#),upper(#flightNo#),TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY'), TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY'),#frqNumber#,upper(#flightKey#), upper(#monday#),upper(#tuesday#),upper(#wednesday#),upper(#thursday#),upper(#friday#), upper(#saturday#),upper(#sunday#),upper(#jvIndicator#),upper(#warehouseLevel#), upper(#breakDown#),upper(#createUserId#), current_timestamp(0),upper(#createUserId#),current_timestamp(0),#cargoAircraftType#,#svcType#,#fltModule1#,#fltModule2#,#expFltModule1#,#expFltModule2#,#chkOutArea#,#toIndicator#,#rho#,#vesselId#,#vesselName#,#voyageNumber#,#shippingAgent#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_SCH SET MON_FLG = upper(#monday#), TUE_FLG = upper(#tuesday#), WED_FLG = upper(#wednesday#), THU_FLG = upper(#thursday#), FRI_FLG = upper(#friday#), SAT_FLG = upper(#saturday#), SUN_FLG = upper(#sunday#), CHKOUT_AREA = upper(#chkOutArea#), WH_LEVEL = upper(#warehouseLevel#), FLT_MODULE1 = upper(#fltModule1#), FLT_MODULE2 = upper(#fltModule2#), EXP_FLT_MODULE1 = upper(#expFltModule1#), EXP_FLT_MODULE2 = upper(#expFltModule2#), CGO_ACFT_TYPE = upper(#cargoAircraftType#), SVC_TYPE = upper(#svcType#), JV_CODE = upper(#jvIndicator#), TO_IND = upper(#toIndicator#), OUTSTANDING = 'N', LM_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), LM_USER_ID = #createUserId#, RHO_ID = #rho#, VESSEL_ID = #vesselId#, VESSEL_NAME = #vesselName#, VOYAGE_NUM = #voyageNumber#, SHIPPING_AGENT = #shippingAgent# where tr_no = #trno#

UPDATE FLT_SCH_LEG SET BRD_POINT = UPPER(#boardPoint#), OFF_POINT = UPPER(#offPoint#), SCH_ARR_TIME = #scheduleArrTime:NUMERIC#, SCH_DEP_TIME = #scheduleDepTime:NUMERIC#, ACFT_TYPE= #aircraftType#, LM_USER_ID ='ADMIN', LM_DATE = current_timestamp(0), ARR_DAY_CHANGE = #arrDayChange:NUMERIC#, DEP_DAY_CHANGE = #depDayChange:NUMERIC#, PROHIBIT_SHC1 = #prohibitedShc1#, PROHIBIT_SHC2 = #prohibitedShc2#, PROHIBIT_SHC3 = #prohibitedShc3#, HSE_BU_IND = #houseBuconfig#, AUTO_ASSGN_ULD = #autoAssignUld# WHERE TR_NO = #trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO = #docLineNumber#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT( CONCAT(TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'DDMONYY'),' - ') ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'DDMONYY')) AS codeId , CONCAT( CONCAT(TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'DDMONYY'),' - ') ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'DDMONYY')) AS codeDesc FROM FLT_SCH WHERE FLT_NO=#flightNo# AND CARR_CODE=upper(#flightCarr#) AND cr_user_id not in ('SSMRPL', 'SSMCNL', 'SSMCNLNEW', 'SSMEQT', 'SSMTIM')

SELECT TR_NO AS trno, CARR_CODE AS flightCarr, FLT_NO AS flightNo, FLT_KEY AS flightKey, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS endDate, JV_CODE AS jvIndicator, WH_LEVEL AS warehouseLevel, CHKOUT_AREA AS chkOutArea, CGO_ACFT_TYPE AS cargoAircraftType, SUN_FLG AS sunday, MON_FLG AS monday, TUE_FLG AS tuesday, WED_FLG AS wednesday, THU_FLG AS thursday, FRI_FLG AS friday, SAT_FLG AS saturday, SVC_TYPE AS svcType, FLT_MODULE1 AS fltModule1, FLT_MODULE2 AS fltModule2, EXP_FLT_MODULE1 AS expFltModule1, EXP_FLT_MODULE2 AS expFltModule2, TO_IND AS toIndicator, RHO_ID AS rho, VESSEL_ID AS vesselId, VESSEL_NAME AS vesselName, VOYAGE_NUM AS voyageNumber, SHIPPING_AGENT AS shippingAgent FROM FLT_SCH WHERE CARR_CODE= upper(#flightCarr#) AND FLT_NO= #flightNo# AND START_DATE = TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY') AND END_DATE = TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY') and TR_NO = #trno#

SELECT TR_NO AS trno, DOC_LINE_NO AS docLineNumber, LEG_ORDER AS legOrder, FRQ_NO AS frqNumber, BRD_POINT AS boardPoint, OFF_POINT AS offPoint, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2) AS scheduleTimeArrHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4) AS scheduleTimeArrMin, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2) AS scheduleTimeDepHr, SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4) AS scheduleTimeDepMin, ARR_DAY_CHANGE AS arrDayChange, DEP_DAY_CHANGE AS depDayChange, ACFT_TYPE AS aircraftType, PROHIBIT_SHC1 AS prohibitedShc1, PROHIBIT_SHC2 AS prohibitedShc2, PROHIBIT_SHC3 AS prohibitedShc3, AUTO_ASSGN_ULD autoAssignUld, HSE_BU_IND AS houseBuConfig FROM FLT_SCH_LEG WHERE TR_NO=#trno# order by leg_order

SELECT A.TR_NO AS trno, A.CARR_CODE AS carrierCode, A.FLT_NO AS flightNo, A.FLT_KEY AS flightKey, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS startdate, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS enddate, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE,'MM') AS startMonth, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'MM') AS endMonth, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'yyyy') AS year, A.SUN_FLG AS sunday, A.MON_FLG AS monday, A.TUE_FLG AS tuesday, A.WED_FLG AS wednesday, A.THU_FLG AS thursday, A.FRI_FLG AS friday, A.SAT_FLG AS saturday, B.DOC_LINE_NO AS doclineNo, B.BRD_POINT AS boardingPt, B.OFF_POINT AS offPt, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) arrTime, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) depTime, B.ARR_DAY_CHANGE AS arrDayChange, B.DEP_DAY_CHANGE AS depDayChange, B.ACFT_TYPE AS aircraft, A.SVC_TYPE AS svc FROM FLT_SCH A, FLT_SCH_LEG B WHERE A.CARR_CODE= upper(#carrierCode#) AND A.FLT_NO= #flightNo# AND A.START_DATE = TO_DATE(#startdate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.END_DATE = TO_DATE(#enddate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.TR_NO = B.TR_NO AND B.TR_NO = (#trno#) AND B.DOC_LINE_NO = (#doclineNo#)
select to_char(NEXT_DAY(to_date(#querydate#,'DDMONYY'),#fetchDay#),'ddmonyy') where to_char(NEXT_DAY(to_date(#querydate#,'DDMONYY'),#fetchDay#),'ddmonyy')::date <= TO_DATE(#enddate#,'DDMONYY')

SELECT JNT_CAR_1 AS jointFltCarr1, JNT_FLT_1 AS jointFltNo1, JNT_CAR_2 AS jointFltCarr2, JNT_FLT_2 AS jointFltNo2,JNT_CAR_3 AS jointFltCarr3, JNT_FLT_3 AS jointFltNo3, JNT_CAR_4 AS jointFltCarr4, JNT_FLT_4 AS jointFltNo4, JNT_CAR_5 AS jointFltCarr5, JNT_FLT_5 AS jointFltNo5 FROM FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT WHERE TR_NO =#trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO =#doclineNo#

SELECT CONCAT(TO_CHAR(min(START_DATE),'DDMONYY'), TO_CHAR( max(END_DATE),'DDMONYY')) existingSchedules FROM FLT_SCH WHERE CARR_CODE = upper(#flightCarr#) AND FLT_NO = #flightNo# AND ( (#mondayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.MON_FLG = coalesce(#mondayOne#,FLT_SCH.MON_FLG)) OR (#tuesdayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.TUE_FLG = coalesce(#tuesdayOne#,FLT_SCH.TUE_FLG)) OR (#wednesdayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.WED_FLG = coalesce(#wednesdayOne#,FLT_SCH.WED_FLG)) OR (#thursdayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.THU_FLG = coalesce(#thursdayOne#,FLT_SCH.THU_FLG)) OR (#fridayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.FRI_FLG = coalesce(#fridayOne#,FLT_SCH.FRI_FLG)) OR (#saturdayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.SAT_FLG = coalesce(#saturdayOne#,FLT_SCH.SAT_FLG)) OR (#sundayOne# = 'Y' AND FLT_SCH.SUN_FLG = coalesce(#sundayOne#,FLT_SCH.SUN_FLG)) )
AND tr_no <> #leg1TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg2TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg3TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg4TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg5TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg6TrNo#
AND tr_no <> #leg7TrNo#
AND ((#startDate# between START_DATE and END_DATE) OR (#endDate# between START_DATE and END_DATE) OR (#startDate# <= END_DATE AND #endDate# >= START_DATE))
SELECT public.pkg_schedule_flight__CHECK_FLT_SCHEDULE(#P_FLT_KEY#,#P_START_DATE#,#P_END_DATE#,#P_TR_NO#,#DAYS#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT (TR_NO,LDOC_LINE_NO,DOC_LINE_NO,CARR_CODE,FLT_NO,FLT_KEY,START_DATE,END_DATE, FRQ_NO,LEG_ORDER,BRD_POINT,OFF_POINT,JNT_FLT_DATE,JNT_CAR_1,JNT_FLT_1,JNT_CAR_2,JNT_FLT_2, JNT_CAR_3,JNT_FLT_3,JNT_CAR_4,JNT_FLT_4,JNT_CAR_5,JNT_FLT_5,JNT_CAR_6,JNT_FLT_6) VALUES(#trno#,#ldocLineno#,#doclineNo#,#carrierCode#,#flightNo#,#flightKey#, TO_DATE(#startdate#,'DDMONYY'),TO_DATE(#enddate#,'DDMONYY'), #freqNo#,#legOrder#,#boardingPt#,#offPt#, TO_DATE(#jntFltDate#,'DDMONYY'),UPPER(#jointFltCarr1#),#jointFltNo1#,UPPER(#jointFltCarr2#), #jointFltNo2#, UPPER(#jointFltCarr3#),#jointFltNo3#, UPPER(#jointFltCarr4#),#jointFltNo4#, UPPER(#jointFltCarr5#),#jointFltNo5#, UPPER(#jointFltCarr6#),#jointFltNo6#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(JNT_FLT_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS dat,TO_CHAR(JNT_FLT_DATE,'DD') AS day, TO_CHAR(JNT_FLT_DATE,'MONTH') AS mon,TO_CHAR(JNT_FLT_DATE,'YY') AS yr FROM FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT WHERE TR_NO =#trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO =#doclineNo# ORDER BY JNT_FLT_DATE
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT SET JNT_CAR_1 = upper(#jointFltCarr1#), JNT_FLT_1 = #jointFltNo1#, JNT_CAR_2 = upper(#jointFltCarr2#), JNT_FLT_2 = #jointFltNo2#, JNT_CAR_3 = upper(#jointFltCarr3#), JNT_FLT_3 = #jointFltNo3#, JNT_CAR_4 = upper(#jointFltCarr4#), JNT_FLT_4 = #jointFltNo4#, JNT_CAR_5 = upper(#jointFltCarr5#), JNT_FLT_5 = #jointFltNo5# WHERE TR_NO =#trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO =#doclineNo# AND JNT_FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#jntFltDate#,'DDMONYY')
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT WHERE TR_NO =#trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO =#doclineNo# AND JNT_FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#jntFltDate#,'DDMONYY')
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.TR_NO AS trno, A.CARR_CODE AS carrierCode, A.FLT_NO AS flightNo, A.FLT_KEY AS flightKey, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS startdate, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS enddate, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE,'MONTH') AS startMonth, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'MONTH') AS endMonth, TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'yyyy') AS year, A.SUN_FLG AS sunday, A.MON_FLG AS monday, A.TUE_FLG AS tuesday, A.WED_FLG AS wednesday, A.THU_FLG AS thursday, A.FRI_FLG AS friday, A.SAT_FLG AS saturday, B.DOC_LINE_NO AS doclineNo, B.BRD_POINT AS boardingPt, B.OFF_POINT AS offPt, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),0,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) arrTime, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),0,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(B.SCH_DEP_TIME,0),'0000')),3,4)) depTime, B.ARR_DAY_CHANGE AS arrDayChange, B.DEP_DAY_CHANGE AS depDayChange, B.ACFT_TYPE AS aircraft, A.SVC_TYPE AS svc, B.FRQ_NO AS freqNo, B.LEG_ORDER AS legOrder, B.PROHIBIT_SHC1 AS prohibitedShc1, B.PROHIBIT_SHC2 AS prohibitedShc2, B.PROHIBIT_SHC3 AS prohibitedShc3, B.HSE_BU_IND AS houseBuconfig FROM FLT_SCH A, FLT_SCH_LEG B WHERE A.CARR_CODE= upper(#carrierCode#) AND A.FLT_NO= #flightNo# AND A.START_DATE = TO_DATE(#startdate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.END_DATE = TO_DATE(#enddate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.TR_NO = B.TR_NO AND B.TR_NO = (#trno#) AND B.DOC_LINE_NO = (#doclineNo#)
SELECT (TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY') - CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)::date)::text DAYDIFF
SELECT (TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY') - TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DD-MON-YY'))::text DAYDIFF

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CAST(TO_DATE(#endDate#, 'DDMONYY') AS DATE) - (CAST(TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'DDMONYY') AS DATE) + (INTERVAL '1 month' * (SELECT CAST(RULE_VALUE AS INTEGER) FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='SCH_DURATION_FLT_SCHDULE' LIMIT 1)))))/86400 AS NUMERIC)) AS VARCHAR) AS DAYDIFF
SELECT RULE_VALUE FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='SCH_DURATION_FLT_SCHDULE' LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) FROM FLT_SCH_LEG_JNT WHERE TR_NO=#trno# AND DOC_LINE_NO=#docLineNumber#
SELECT CODE AS carrCode, CODE_DESC AS carrName FROM MAST_CARRIER WHERE OWNED_CARR = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT CODE AS carrCode, CODE_DESC AS carrName FROM MAST_CARRIER ORDER BY CODE

select b.TR_NO txnNo , a.CARR_CODE flightCarr, a.FLT_NO flightNo, a.FLT_KEY flightKey, TO_CHAR(FLT_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, lpad(CAST(a.SCH_TIME AS TEXT), 4,'0') hrAndMinSch, lpad(CAST(a.EST_TIME AS TEXT), 4,'0') hrAndMinEst, lpad(CAST(a.ACT_TIME AS TEXT), 4,'0') hrAndMinAct, FBL_T fbl, RCS_T rcs, PRE_MAN_T preMan, N_BLDUP notBuildUp, lpad(BLDUP_COM_TIME::text, 4,'0') buildUpCompletionTime, CHK_ULD checkedOut, lpad(FLT_CLS::text, 4,'0') fltCloserTime, lpad(DLS::text, 4,'0') dlsTime, OFLD_IND ofldFlag, lpad(CAST(FFM AS TEXT), 4,'0') ffmTime, FSU fsu, FWB fwb, FHL fhl, SVC_ACH handler, TON_KG ton from GT_FLT_MONITORING_EXP a, FLT_OPR b
a.Flt_Key = b.Flt_Key and a.Flt_DATE = b.sch_DATE and b.FLT_TYPE = 'D'
AND a.FLT_KEY = #flightKey#
AND a.FLT_NO = #flightNo#
AND a.CARR_CODE = #flightCarr#
AND a.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#
Order BY a.FLT_DATE , to_char(a.SCH_TIME, '0000')

select b.TR_NO txnNo , b.CARR_CODE flightCarr, b.FLT_NO flightNo, b.FLT_KEY flightKey, TO_CHAR(FLT_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, lpad(b.SCH_TIME::text, 4,'0') hrAndMinSch, lpad(b.EST_TIME::text, 4,'0') hrAndMinEst, lpad(b.ACT_TIME::text, 4,'0') hrAndMinAct, FFM_T ffmCount, FHL_T fhlCount, ULD_ACC uldCount, lpad(RAMP_COMPL_TIME::text, 4,'0') rampCompletionTime, CAR_T carCount, FLT_CLR flightCloserFlag, LEFT_BEH lbFlag, lpad(DOC_COMPL_TIME::text, 4,'0') docCompletionTime, DOC_IRR_T dir, lpad(BDS_XPS::text, 4,'0') xpsTime, lpad(CAST(BDS_PER AS TEXT), 4,'0') perTime, lpad(BDS_GEN::text, 4,'0') gen, CGO_IRR_T cirCount, DAM_T dam, lpad(FLT_CLS::text, 4,'0') fltCloserTime, SRF_TRM_T srf, TON_KG ton from GT_FLT_MONITORING_IMP a, FLT_OPR b
a.Flt_Key = b.Flt_Key and a.Flt_DATE = b.sch_DATE and b.FLT_TYPE = 'A'
AND a.FLT_KEY = #flightKey#
AND a.FLT_KEY = #flightKey#
AND a.FLT_NO = #flightNo#
AND a.CARR_CODE = #flightCarr#
AND a.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#
Order BY a.FLT_DATE , to_char(a.SCH_TIME, '0000')

select TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) - (8/24),'DDMONYY') schDate , TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) - (8/24),'HH24') schTimeHr, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) - (8/24),'MI') schTimeMin, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) + (8/24),'DDMONYY') schDateTo, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) + (8/24),'HH24') schTimeHrTo , TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) + (8/24),'MI') schTimeMinTo

SELECT TR_NO FROM FLT_SCH WHERE CARR_CODE = upper(#flightCarr#) and FLT_NO = upper(#flightNo#) and START_DATE =TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY') and END_DATE = TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY') and FRQ_NO = #frqNumber:NUMERIC# and mon_flg=#monday# and tue_flg=#tuesday# and wed_flg=#wednesday# and thu_flg=#thursday# and fri_flg=#friday# and sat_flg=#saturday# and sun_flg=#sunday# AND cr_user_id not in ('SSMCNL', 'SSMCNLNEW')
SELECT coalesce(max(FRQ_NO),0) FROM FLT_SCH_LEG WHERE TR_NO = upper(#trNo#)

SELECT CAST(OPR.TR_NO AS TEXT) txnNo, OPR.FLT_KEY flightKey, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') schDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_DATE,'DD') estDate, TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_DATE,'DD') actDate, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.SCH_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinSch, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.EST_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinEst, rtrim(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),1,2), ':', SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(OPR.ACT_TIME,'0000')),3,4)), ':') hrAndMinAct, OPR.FLT_TYPE flightType, CASE OPR.FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN ORIG WHEN 'D' THEN DEST ELSE ORIG END fromLoc, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE =OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE AND CODE_TYPE='CGO_ACFT_TYPE') cargoArcftType, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_ACFT_TYPE WHERE CODE =OPR.ACFT_TYPE) airCraftType, OPR.ACFT_REG_NO arcftRegionNo, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM MAST_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE =OPR.STATUS AND CODE_TYPE='FLT_STATUS') arrDepStatus, OPR.SCH_GATE gate,OPR.ACFT_PRK_BAY bay, WTHR_COND weather, OPR.RMK remarks, CASE OPR.FLT_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN COALESCE((SELECT 'Y' FROM EDI_FFM_MSG WHERE FLT_KEY = OPR.FLT_KEY AND FLT_DATE = OPR.SCH_DATE AND FFM_STATUS = 'P' LIMIT 1), 'N') WHEN 'D' THEN EVENT.DLS_IND END as ffmInd, public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD') AS ata, public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ETA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,OPR.FLT_TYPE,'DD') AS eta FROM FLT_OPR OPR, FLT_OPR_EVENTS EVENT WHERE OPR.FLT_TYPE = #FLT_TYPE# AND OPR.FLT_KEY LIKE UPPER(#FLT_KEY#) AND OPR.SCH_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(CAST(#SCH_DATE_FROM# AS TEXT),'DDMONYY') AND TO_DATE(CAST(#SCH_DATE_TO# AS TEXT),'DDMONYY') AND OPR.TR_NO = EVENT.TR_NO

Select t.flt_key flightKey,t.carr_code flightCarr, to_char(t.sch_date,'DDMONYY') schDate, lpad(CAST(t.SCH_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0') sta, lpad(CAST(t.EST_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0') eta, lpad(CAST(t.ACT_TIME AS TEXT), 4, '0') ata, public.PKG_IMP__get_ULD_Allot(t.flt_key, t.sch_date, 'I') ttlAllot, public.PKG_IMP__get_ULD_Allot(t.flt_key, t.sch_date, 'A') updatedAllot, r.CHKIN_COMPLETE checkInStatus, t.WH_LEVEL airsideLevel, '' flightStatus, t.RHO_ID rhoUser , cr.code_desc fromId from flt_opr t left join cust_company cr on cr.code = t.RHO_ID join IMP_RAMP_CHK_HD r on r.flt_key = t.flt_key and r.flt_date = t.sch_date where t.flt_type = 'A' and sch_date between #schDate# and #schDateTo# and t.carr_code = coalesce(#flightCarr#, t.carr_code) and t.flt_no = coalesce(#flightNo#, t.flt_no) and coalesce(t.RHO_ID, '*') = coalesce(#custCode#, coalesce(t.RHO_ID, '*')) and r.CHKIN_COMPLETE = coalesce(#checkInStatus#, r.CHKIN_COMPLETE) and exists (select null from IMP_RAMP_INB_CHK_DTL where flt_key = t.flt_key and flt_date = t.sch_date)

select r.uld_key uldKey , coalesce(ag.ULD_ALLOT, 'BT') uldType, case when length(r.uld_key) > 8 then null else coalesce((select sum(STRG_WT) from imp_awb_strg_dtl where CHKIN_ULD_KEY = r.uld_key and flt_key = r.flt_key and flt_date = r.flt_date), 0) end wt, coalesce((select CHKIN_YN from IMP_RAMP_CHK_DTL where ULD_KEY = r.uld_key and flt_key = r.flt_key and flt_date = r.flt_date), 'N') checkInStatus , #airsideLevel# airsideLevel from IMP_RAMP_INB_CHK_DTL r left join ULD_Group_Type gt on gt.ULD_TYPE = r.ULD_TYPE and length(r.uld_key) > 8 left join MAST_ULD_ALLOT_GROUP ag on ag.ULD_GROUP = gt.ULD_GROUP where flt_key = #flightKey# and flt_date = to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IMP_MIFS ( MIFS_NO, RHO_ID, FLT_KEY, FLT_DATE, ULD_KEY, CR_DATE,CR_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #mifsNo#, #rhoId#, #fltKey#, TO_Date( to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY'), 'DDMONYY'), #uldKey#, current_timestamp(0), #userId#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT coalesce(max(leg_order),0)+1 FROM FLT_SCH_LEG WHERE TR_NO = upper(#trNo#)
SELECT (TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY HH24:MI'))::text DAYDIFF
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS TEXT) FROM flt_opr where flt_type = 'A' and sch_date = TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') and flt_key = #flightKey#

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(sch_arr_date),'DDMONYY') as schArrDate,max(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SCH_ARR_TIME,0),'0000')),0,2)) AS schArrTimeHr, max(SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(sch_arr_time,0),'0000')),3,4)) AS schArrTimeMin FROM flt_opr_leg where flt_type = 'A' and sch_date = TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY') and flt_key = #flightKey#
select to_date(#toTime#,'HH24MI') - to_date(#fromTime#,'HH24MI')

select count(*) from FLT_OPR where flt_key=#flightKey# and TO_CHAR(SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY')::date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#,'DDMONYY') AND TO_DATE(#endDate#,'DDMONYY') AND TO_CHAR(SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') = TO_CHAR(current_timestamp(0),'DDMONYY')

SELECT FLT_KEY fltNoDisp, TR_NO txnNo, CARR_CODE flightCarr, FLT_NO flightNo, SCH_DATE schDate, STA sta, ATA ata, ACFT_TYPE acftType, USAGE usage, MODULE module, MODULE2 module2, FFM ffm, DDT ddt, FHL fhl , CED ced, CAR car, PERC perc, SSR ssr, IMR imr, IMX imx, BKG bkg, FLT_CLR fltClr, BRKDN brkDwn, CHK_IN chkIn, FLT_CLOSE fltClose, DDM_FMT ddtFmt, EST_TIME estimateDate, SCH_TIME scheduleDate, SHC shc , FFM_FMT ffmFmt, COLOR_1 chkInClr, COLOR_2 bdClr, RHO rhoUser, (select code_desc from CUST_COMPANY where CODE=RHO) AS rhoUserName FROM GT_FLT_MONITOR OPR WHERE 1=1
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
OPR.STATUS !='X' and ( OPR.FLT_CLOSE='N' or (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA((substr(OPR.FLT_KEY,1,length(OPR.FLT_KEY)-8)),cast(OPR.SCH_DATE AS DATE),'A','DD')) IS NULL )
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList#))
AND OPR.CARR_CODE = #carrList#
ORDER BY COALESCE(EST_DATE,SCH_DATE), COALESCE(EST_TIME,SCH_TIME)

SELECT FLT_KEY fltNoDisp, CARR_CODE flightCarr, TR_NO txnNo, FLT_NO flightNo, SCH_DATE schDate, STA sta, ATA ata, ACFT_TYPE acftType, USAGE usage, MODULE module, MODULE2 module2, TOTAL total, QT qt, XT xt, NL NL, PE pe, PER_CHK_IN percChkIn, TOTAL_BD totalBd, TOTAL_TON totalTon, QT_BD qtBd, XT_BD xtBd, QT_TON qtTon, XT_TON xtTon, NL_BD nlBd, NL_TON nlTon, SHC_BD shcBd, SHC_TON shcTon, PER_BD percBD, CIR cir, DAM dam, COLOR_1 chkInClr, COLOR_2 bdClr, RHO rhoUser, (select code_desc from CUST_COMPANY where CODE=RHO) AS rhoUserName FROM GT_FLT_MONITOR OPR WHERE 1=1
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
AND OPR.STATUS !='X' and ( OPR.FLT_CLOSE='N' or (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA((substr(OPR.FLT_KEY,0,length(OPR.FLT_KEY)-8)),cast(OPR.SCH_DATE AS DATE),'A','DD')) IS NULL )
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList#))
AND OPR.CARR_CODE = #carrList#
ORDER BY COALESCE(EST_DATE,CAST(SCH_DATE AS TIMESTAMP)) , COALESCE(EST_TIME,SCH_TIME)

SELECT FLT_KEY fltNoDisp, TR_NO txnNo, CARR_CODE flightCarr, FLT_NO flightNo, SCH_DATE schDate, STA std, ATA atd, ACFT_TYPE acftType, USAGE usage, MODULE module, MODULE2 module2, EST_TIME estimateDate, SCH_TIME scheduleDate, ALLOTMENT_1 allotment1, ALLOTMENT_2 allotment2, TONNAGE tonnage, RCV_BOOKD rcvBooked, PMAN pman, coalesce(TRMAC_BUP_PC,0) tarmacbupc, coalesce(TRMAC_BUP_WT,0.0) tarmacbuwt, BULK_BU bulkbu, PPK_BU ppkbu, QT_BU qtbu, BUP_ERC buperc, BULK_MAN_BU bulkpmanbu, PPK_MAN_BU ppkpmanbu, SEC_CHK secCheck, DISC disc, CONS cons, COLOR_1 color1, COLOR_2 color2, RHO rhoUser, (select code_desc from CUST_COMPANY where CODE=RHO) AS rhoUserName , DUO_RECD_IND as duoRecv, DUO_OFLD_IND as duoOfld, DUO_IN_TIME as duoInTime FROM GT_FLT_MONITOR OPR WHERE 1=1
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
AND OPR.STATUS !='X' and ( OPR.FLT_CLOSE='N' or (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA((substr(OPR.FLT_KEY,0,length(OPR.FLT_KEY)-8)),cast(OPR.SCH_DATE AS DATE),'D','DD')) IS NULL )
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList#))
AND OPR.CARR_CODE = #carrList#
ORDER BY COALESCE(EST_DATE,CAST(SCH_DATE AS TIMESTAMP)) , COALESCE(EST_TIME,SCH_TIME)

SELECT OPR.FLT_KEY fltNoDisp, OPR.TR_NO txnNo, OPR.CARR_CODE flightCarr, OPR.FLT_NO flightNo, OPR.SCH_DATE schDate, OPR.STA std, OPR.ATA atd, OPR.ACFT_TYPE acftType, OPR.USAGE usage, OPR.MODULE module, OPR.MODULE2 module2, OPR.ULD_ASGND uldasgd, OPR.ULD_CHKOUT uldchkout, OPR.FLT_FINAL tofnl, OPR.BU_COMPLETE bucomp, OPR.DOC_COMPLETED doccompl, OPR.FINAL_MANF manffnl, OPR.DISPATCH_READY rdydisp, OPR.DLS_IND dls, OPR.CUSTOM_OUT customout, OPR.DEPART depart, OPR.OFLD_TON ofldton, OPR.OFFLD_CONFIRM ofldcomp, OPR.COLOR_1 color1, OPR.COLOR_2 color2, OPR.FLT_CLOSE fltClose, OPR.RHO rhoUser, (SELECT code_desc FROM CUST_COMPANY WHERE CODE=OPR.RHO ) AS rhoUserName FROM GT_FLT_MONITOR OPR join flt_opr_events a on a.carr_code = opr.carr_code and a.flt_no = opr.flt_no AND a.sch_date = CAST(opr.sch_date AS date) and a.sch_date = CAST(opr.sch_date AS DATE) and a.flt_type = 'D' WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.NOTOC_IND = 'Y'
AND (a.NOTOC_IND = 'N' or a.NOTOC_IND is null)
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #loginCarrier#))
AND OPR.STATUS !='X' and ( OPR.FLT_CLOSE='N' or (public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA((substr(OPR.FLT_KEY,0,length(OPR.FLT_KEY)-8)),cast(OPR.SCH_DATE AS DATE),'D','DD')) IS NULL )
AND (OPR.CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList# OR OPR.CARR_CODE IN (SELECT CARR_CODE FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE = #groupCarrList#))
AND OPR.CARR_CODE = #carrList#
ORDER BY COALESCE(OPR.EST_DATE,CAST(OPR.SCH_DATE AS TIMESTAMP)), COALESCE(OPR.EST_TIME,OPR.SCH_TIME)

select opr.FLT_TYPE as flightType,opr.FLT_KEY as flightKey ,opr.ORIG as fromLoc,
(select STRAGG(STRINGDELIM(off_point, '/')) FROM (select off_point from FLT_OPR A LEFT JOIN FLT_OPR_LEG b ON A.flt_key = b.flt_key AND A.sch_date = b.sch_date AND A.flt_type = b.flt_type AND A.tr_no = b.tr_no WHERE A.FLT_KEY=#flightKey# AND A.SCH_DATE = to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.FLT_TYPE = #flightType# order by leg_ord asc) s ) as toLoc, to_char(opr.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') as schDate, public.PKG_COMMON__GET_FLT_ATA(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,#flightType#) AS ata, public.PKG_COMMON__get_flt_eta(OPR.FLT_KEY,OPR.SCH_DATE,#flightType#) AS eta, to_char(opr.sch_time,'0000') as schTimeHr, opr.TO_IND as toIndicator,CODE_WH.CODE_DESC as warehouselvl, opr.CHKOUT_AREA as chkOutArea ,opr.ACFT_REG_NO as arcftRegionNo ,opr.ACFT_PRK_BAY as bay,opr.GROUND_HANDLER as cto, opr.SCH_GATE as gate, opr.FLT_MODULE1 as fltModule1,opr.FLT_MODULE2 as fltModule2, case count(ffm.flt_key) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as ffmInd, case count(fwb.awb_no) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as fwb, case count(OPR_EVENTS_DLS.flt_key) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as dlsInd, case count(FBL.flt_key) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as fbl, case count(FHL.FLT_CARR) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as fhl, case count(OPR_EVENTS_OFLD.flt_key) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as ofldFlag, case count(MLOG.flt_key) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as obmmInd,
(select cc.CODE_DESC from CUST_COMPANY cc where cc.code = opr.RHO_ID limit 1) as rhoUser, code_dtl.CODE_DESC as cargoArcftType, case count(eep.tr_no) when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as fltAllotment from FLT_OPR opr left outer join EDI_FFM_MSG ffm on opr.flt_key=ffm.flt_key and opr.sch_date=ffm.flt_date left outer join EDI_FFM_SHP FFM_SHP on FFM_SHP.TR_NO=ffm.TR_NO left outer join EDI_FWB fwb on FFM_SHP.AWB_NO=fwb.AWB_NO and FFM_SHP.AWB_DATE=fwb.AWB_DATE left outer join FLT_OPR_EVENTS OPR_EVENTS_DLS on opr.flt_key=OPR_EVENTS_DLS.flt_key and opr.sch_date=OPR_EVENTS_DLS.SCH_DATE and OPR_EVENTS_DLS.DLS_IND='Y' left outer join FLT_OPR_EVENTS OPR_EVENTS_OFLD on opr.flt_key=OPR_EVENTS_OFLD.flt_key and opr.sch_date=OPR_EVENTS_OFLD.SCH_DATE and OPR_EVENTS_OFLD.ofld_cfm_ind='Y' --left outer join EDI_FBL FBL on opr.flt_key=FBL.flt_key and opr.sch_date=FBL.flt_date and row_number() over ()=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT flt_key, flt_date FROM ( SELECT FBL.flt_key, FBL.flt_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY FBL.flt_key ORDER BY FBL.flt_date) AS rn FROM EDI_FBL FBL ) subquery WHERE rn = 1 ) FBL ON opr.flt_key = FBL.flt_key AND opr.sch_date = FBL.flt_date
left outer join EDI_FHL FHL on FHL.FLT_CARR=OPR.CARR_CODE and FHL.FLT_NO=OPR.FLT_NO and OPR.SCH_DATE=FHL.flt_date left outer join MESSAGE_LOG MLOG on MLOG.FLT_KEY=OPR.FLT_KEY and opr.sch_date=MLOG.FLT_DATE and MLOG.MSG_TYPE='OBM' left outer join cust_company comp on comp.carr_code=opr.carr_code and comp.carr_code=#carrCode# left outer join mast_code_dtl code_dtl on OPR.CGO_ACFT_TYPE=code_dtl.CODE and code_dtl.CODE_TYPE='CGO_ACFT_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN MAST_CODE_DTL CODE_WH ON CODE_WH.CODE=opr.WH_LEVEL AND CODE_WH.CODE_TYPE='WH_LEVEL' left join edi_elp_msg eep on opr.flt_key=eep.flt_key and opr.sch_date=eep.flt_date where opr.CARR_CODE=#carrCode# and opr.FLT_NO=#flightNo#
and to_char(opr.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY')::date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')
and opr.FLT_TYPE=#flightType#
GROUP BY opr.FLT_TYPE, opr.FLT_KEY, opr.ORIG, opr.DEST, OPR.SCH_DATE, to_char(opr.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY'), to_char(opr.sch_time,'0000'), opr.TO_IND, CODE_WH.CODE_DESC, opr.CHKOUT_AREA, opr.ACFT_REG_NO, opr.ACFT_PRK_BAY, opr.GROUND_HANDLER, opr.SCH_GATE, opr.FLT_MODULE1, opr.FLT_MODULE2, comp.CODE_DESC, code_dtl.CODE_DESC,opr.TO_IND,opr.RHO_ID

SELECT (case when (select count(1) from edi_msg_log_out where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and msg_type='FWB' ) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end) AS fwb, (case when (select count(1) from edi_msg_log_out where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and msg_type='FFM' ) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end) AS ffmInd, (case when (select count(1) from edi_msg_log_out where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and msg_type='FHL' ) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end) AS fhl

SELECT COALESCE(count(1),0) FROM FLT_OPR WHERE
CARR_CODE = #carrCode# AND FLT_NO = #flightNo#
AND SCH_DATE= TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY')
AND FLT_TYPE=#flightType#

SELECT TO_CHAR( A.CR_DATE, 'DDMONYY HH24:MI:SS' ) AS crDate, A.CR_USER_ID AS crUserId, ( select des_tag from his_mst_itm where cod_his_seq_num=b.cod_his_seq_num) AS eventId, CASE B.cod_act WHEN 'A' THEN 'ADD' WHEN 'U' THEN 'UPD' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DEL' END as event, B.DES_HIS_DTS as eventDesc FROM HIS_FLT_EVNT A,HIS_FLT_EVNT_DTL B WHERE B.FLT_KEY= A.FLT_KEY AND B.FLT_DATE = A.FLT_DATE AND B.FLT_TYPE = A.FLT_TYPE AND A.COD_TRA_SEQ_NUM = B.COD_TRA_SEQ_NUM AND A.FLT_KEY = #flightNoKey# AND A.FLT_DATE = TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')
AND A.FLT_TYPE in ('D','E','A','I')
--AND A.FLT_TYPE in ('A','I')
AND A.MODULE = 'W' AND A.COD_HIS_TYP = 'E' group by a.FLT_KEY, a.FLT_DATE,A.CR_DATE,A.CR_USER_ID,A.COD_FUNC,B.cod_act,B.DES_HIS_DTS,b.cod_his_seq_num order by A.CR_DATE
select rule_value from cmsrules where RULE_CODE=#param#
SELECT (SELECT RULE_VALUE FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='AUTO_ASSGN_ULD_PAX') autoAsgnUld_PAX, (SELECT RULE_VALUE FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='AUTO_ASSGN_ULD_FRTR') autoAsgnUld_FRTR
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MAST_HSE_BU_CONFIG WHERE CARR_CODE=#carrCode# AND PORT=#port#
select count(1) from flt_opr_leg where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_type=#flightType# and SCH_DEP_DATE=to_date(#schDepDate#,'DDMONYY') and BRD_POINT = #fromLoc#
select count(1) from flt_opr_leg where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_type=#flightType# and SCH_ARR_DATE=to_date(#schArrDate#,'DDMONYY') and OFF_POINT = #toLoc#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE flt_opr_events SET notoc_ack_user = #ackUser# , notoc_ack_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , notoc_ack_ind=#ackInd#,TR_TYPE='ACYN',LM_USER_ID = #ackUser# WHERE flt_type='D' and flt_key=#flightkey# and sch_date=TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY')
UPDATE flt_opr_events SET notoc_ack_user = '' , notoc_ack_date='' , notoc_ack_ind=#ackInd#,TR_TYPE='ACYN' WHERE flt_type='D' and flt_key=#flightkey# and sch_date=TO_DATE( #schDate#, 'DDMONYY')
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.FLT_KEY AS fltKey, TO_CHAR(A.SCH_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS flightDate, A.DEST AS dest, A.ACFT_REG_NO AS acftRegNo, CASE B.CARR_CODE WHEN 'BR' THEN (SELECT RULE_VALUE FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='NOTOC_BR_REPT_ID') ELSE (SELECT RULE_VALUE FROM CMSRULES WHERE RULE_CODE='NOTOC_REPT_ID') END AS reptId, CASE B.BUILDUP_CUSER WHEN '' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS bupComp, A.CARR_CODE AS carrCode FROM FLT_OPR A JOIN FLT_OPR_EVENTS B ON B.FLT_KEY = A.FLT_KEY AND B.SCH_DATE = A.SCH_DATE AND B.FLT_TYPE = A.FLT_TYPE WHERE A.FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND A.SCH_DATE =to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY') AND A.FLT_TYPE ='D'

SELECT SUM(PMAN_PCS) AS pmanPcs,SUM(PMAN_WT) AS pmanWt FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_AWB WHERE FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND FLT_DATE=to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY') AND AWB_NO=#awbNo# AND AWB_DATE=to_date(#awbDate#,'DDMONYY')

SELECT SUM(ASSIGNED_PCS) AS bupPcs,SUM(ASSIGNED_WT) AS bupWt FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_ULD_AWB WHERE FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND FLT_DATE=to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY') AND AWB_NO=#awbNo# AND AWB_DATE=to_date(#awbDate#,'DDMONYY')

SELECT '2' as stat,#awbNo# AS awbNo,A.SPL_CODE AS splCode FROM CUST_AIRL_SPL_CODE A, AWB B WHERE ((A.CARR_CODE = B.carr_code) OR (B.agent_code is not null and A.CUST_NO = B.AGENT_CODE)) AND A.spl_type ='SPL_NOTOC' AND B.AWB_NO = #awbNo# AND B.AWB_DATE = to_date(#awbDate#,'DDMONYY') UNION ALL SELECT '1' as stat,#awbNo# AS awbNo,concat(case when S.spl_code1 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code1 , case when S.spl_code2 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code2 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code2 , case when S.spl_code3 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code3 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code3 , case when S.spl_code4 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code4 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code4 , case when S.spl_code5 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code5 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code5 , case when S.spl_code6 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code6 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code6 , case when S.spl_code7 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code7 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code7 , case when S.spl_code8 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code8 is null then '' else Concat(S.spl_code8 , case when S.spl_code9 is null then '' else ',' end) end , case when S.spl_code9 is null then '' else S.spl_code9 end) AS splCode FROM CUST_AIRL_COMB_SPL_CODE S,AWB P WHERE ((S.CARR_CODE =P.carr_code) OR (p.agent_code is not null and S.CUST_NO = P.AGENT_CODE)) AND S.spl_type ='SPL_NOTOC' AND P.AWB_NO = #awbNo# AND P.AWB_DATE = to_date(#awbDate#,'DDMONYY') ORDER BY STAT ASC

SELECT PMAN.AWB_NO AS awbNo, TO_CHAR(PMAN.AWB_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS awbDate, CONCAT(CASE WHEN AW.spl_code1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code1 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code2 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code3 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code4 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code5 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code6 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code7 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code8 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE AW.spl_code9 END) AS splCode, AW.CONTENT AS content, BUA.ASSIGNED_PCS AS bupPcs, BUA.ASSIGNED_WT AS bupWt, BUA.ULD_BT_NO AS bupULD, PMAN.UNLDG_PT AS ldgPt FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_AWB PMAN JOIN EXP_PMANIFEST_ULD_AWB BUA ON BUA.FLT_KEY = PMAN.FLT_KEY AND BUA.FLT_DATE = PMAN.FLT_DATE AND BUA.UNLDG_PT = PMAN.UNLDG_PT AND BUA.AWB_NO = PMAN.AWB_NO AND BUA.AWB_DATE = PMAN.AWB_DATE AND BUA.NOTOC_IND = 'Y' LEFT JOIN AWB AW ON AW.AWB_NO = PMAN.AWB_NO AND AW.AWB_DATE = PMAN.AWB_DATE WHERE PMAN.FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND PMAN.FLT_DATE =to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY') AND PMAN.NOTOC_IND = 'Y' UNION SELECT PMAN.AWB_NO AS awbNo, TO_CHAR(PMAN.AWB_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS awbDate, CONCAT(CASE WHEN AW.spl_code1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code1 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code2 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code3 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code4 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code5 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code6 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code7 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code8 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE AW.spl_code9 END) AS splCode, AW.CONTENT AS content, BUA.ASSIGNED_PCS AS bupPcs, BUA.ASSIGNED_WT AS bupWt, BUA.ULD_BT_NO AS bupULD, PMAN.UNLDG_PT AS ldgPt FROM EXP_PMAN_TARMAC_AWB PMAN JOIN EXP_PMAN_TARMAC_ULD_AWB BUA ON BUA.FLT_KEY = PMAN.FLT_KEY AND BUA.FLT_DATE = PMAN.FLT_DATE AND BUA.UNLDG_PT = PMAN.UNLDG_PT AND BUA.AWB_NO = PMAN.AWB_NO AND BUA.AWB_DATE = PMAN.AWB_DATE LEFT JOIN AWB AW ON AW.AWB_NO = PMAN.AWB_NO AND AW.AWB_DATE = PMAN.AWB_DATE WHERE PMAN.FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND PMAN.FLT_DATE =to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY') AND PMAN.NOTOC_IND = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_AWB D WHERE D.FLT_KEY = PMAN.FLT_KEY AND D.FLT_DATE=PMAN.FLT_DATE AND D.AWB_NO=PMAN.AWB_NO AND D.AWB_DATE=PMAN.AWB_DATE) UNION SELECT PMAN.AWB_NO AS awbNo, TO_CHAR(PMAN.AWB_DATE,'DDMONYY') AS awbDate, CONCAT(CASE WHEN AW.spl_code1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code1 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code2 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code3 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code4 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code5 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code6 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code6 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code7 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code7 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code8 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(AW.spl_code8 , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '/' END) END , CASE WHEN AW.spl_code9 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE AW.spl_code9 END) AS splCode, AW.CONTENT AS content, PMAN.BULK_PCS AS bupPcs, PMAN.BULK_WT AS bupWt, 'TARMAC BULK' AS bupULD, PMAN.UNLDG_PT AS ldgPt FROM EXP_PMAN_TARMAC_AWB PMAN LEFT JOIN AWB AW ON AW.AWB_NO = PMAN.AWB_NO AND AW.AWB_DATE = PMAN.AWB_DATE WHERE PMAN.FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND PMAN.FLT_DATE =to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY') AND PMAN.NOTOC_IND = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM EXP_PMANIFEST_AWB D WHERE D.FLT_KEY = PMAN.FLT_KEY AND D.FLT_DATE=PMAN.FLT_DATE AND D.AWB_NO=PMAN.AWB_NO AND D.AWB_DATE=PMAN.AWB_DATE) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM EXP_PMAN_TARMAC_ULD_AWB E WHERE E.FLT_KEY = PMAN.FLT_KEY AND E.FLT_DATE=PMAN.FLT_DATE AND E.AWB_NO=PMAN.AWB_NO AND E.AWB_DATE=PMAN.AWB_DATE)
select sum(pman_pcs) as pmanPcs,sum(pman_wt) as pmanWt from exp_pmanifest_awb where flt_key = #fltKey# and flt_date = to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY')

select sum(b.assigned_pcs) as buPcs,sum(b.assigned_wt) as buWt from exp_pmanifest_uld a join exp_pmanifest_uld_awb b on a.uld_bt_no = b.uld_bt_no and a.flt_key= b.flt_key and a.flt_date= b.flt_date where a.flt_key=#fltKey# and a.flt_date = to_date(#flightDate#,'DDMONYY')

SELECT a.GRP_CARR_CODE as strCarrGroup FROM MAST_CARR_GRP a,MAST_CARRIER b where b.CODE=a.GRP_CARR_CODE and b.handled_by_terminal='CPCT' AND b.owned_carr='Y' and a.GRP_CARR_CODE like (Concat('%',#keySearchStr# ,'%')) and ROWNUM <= #maxRecFetch# group by a.GRP_CARR_CODE, a.GRP_CARR_CODE
select count(1) from MAST_CARR_GRP where grp_carr_code=#grpcarr# and carr_code=#fltcarr#

SELECT CONCAT(TO_CHAR(ACT_DATE, 'DDMONYY'), ' ', LPAD(CAST(act_time AS TEXT), 4, '0')) AS actTime FROM FLT_OPR WHERE FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND SCH_DATE= to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY') AND flt_type=#flightType#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FLT_OPR_EVENTS WHERE FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND SCH_DATE=to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY') AND flt_cls_yn='Y' AND flt_type=#flightType# AND flt_cls_date IS NOT NULL AND FLT_CLS_TIME IS NOT NULL
SELECT CASE WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM (TO_TIMESTAMP(#oldActDate#, 'DDMONYY HH24MI') - TO_TIMESTAMP(#newActDate#, 'DDMONYY HH24MI'))) != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DAYDIFF
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FLT_OPR_EVENTS SET FLT_CLS_YN='Y', FLT_CLS_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), FLT_CLS_TIME = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),'HH24MI'), FLT_CLS_USER_ID = 'SYSTEM',LM_USER_ID= 'SYSTEM',LM_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),TR_TYPE='CLFLT' WHERE FLT_KEY=#fltKey# AND SCH_DATE =to_date(#fltDate#,'DDMONYY') AND FLT_TYPE=#flightType#
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from edi_fbl where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') and fbl_status='CONT'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE edi_fbl set fbl_status='UNPRO',lm_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0),lm_user_id=#userId# where flt_key=#flightKey# and flt_date=to_date(#schDate#,'DDMONYY') AND fbl_status='CONT'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as vesselFlight FROM MAST_CARRIER where CODE = #flightCarr# and coalesce(VESSEL_FLT_YN,'N') = 'Y'

SELECT stfs_flt_key AS STFS_KEY, TO_CHAR(stfs_flt_date,'DDMONYY') AS STFS_DATE FROM FLT_OPR where flt_key= #FLT_KEY# AND sch_date = to_date(#FLT_DATE#,'DDMONYY') AND flt_type = #FLT_TYPE# and stfs_flt_key is not null
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #flightCarr#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #flightCarr# AND CARR_CODE= #chiledCar#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #flightCarr#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAST_CARR_GRP WHERE GRP_CARR_CODE= #flightCarr# AND CARR_CODE= #chiledCar#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FLT_OPR_AIRLINE WHERE TR_NO = #txnNo# and CARR_CODE= #flightCarr# and FLT_KEY= #flightNoKey#
DELETE FROM FLT_SCH_AIRLINE WHERE TR_NO = #trno# and CARR_CODE= #flightCarr# and FLT_KEY= #flightKey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) as dummyAirlineCnt FROM FLT_OPR opr, FLT_OPR_AIRLINE air WHERE FLT_TYPE = #flightType# AND opr.tr_no = air.tr_no AND air.flt_key = #flightNoKey# AND SCH_DATE= TO_DATE(#schDate#,'DDMONYY')
SELECT CARR_CODE AS CARR_CODE,FLT_TYPE AS FLT_TYPE FROM FLT_OPR WHERE FLT_KEY=#FLTKEY# AND SCH_DATE=to_date(#FLTDATE#,'DDMONYY')
